content: **note written in uk abbreviations uk double_crochet = usa single_crochet** everything else is the same ---- this cute t-rex just wants a hug to make this pattern you will need worsted-weight yarn in 3 colors size g crochet hook 4 0 mm fiberfill or stuffing needle with a large eye black and white fabric paint white felt black & white fabric paint small amount of black yarn this pattern is at an easy/intermediate level previous amigurumi experience is recommended you need to know how to single_crochet in the round increase and decrease finished product measures about 8 tall and 7 across as the widest part of the head *** thank you to mytimemedia for publishing my pattern in the german edition of their amigurumi 2015 bookazine their talented editors beautifully put together this pattern and have allowed me to use their pdf on my website i hope you enjoy *** + + + + + + + + + please don t sell or redistribute any copies of this pattern via email or printed or in any other form finished products made may be sold but please credit my pattern thank you feel free to message me with any questions pattern has not been beta tested please let me know if you come across any errors
